name: Aequitas Global
tag_list: business-planning, small-business, business-research, market-research, business-strategy, social-media-statergy, value-research, company-valuation, sme-consulting, small-business-research, ma-for-sme, brand-consulting, change-management, business-process-
overview:
Strategic Business solutions and services for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises.

Aequitas Global imparts strategic business solutions for Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises (SME). We started our first project in 2009 with a Market Viability Assessment and Value research. We make possible for the Entrepreneur’s to implement strategy in day-to-day operations. Our strategic business solutions covers the challenges with Entrepreneur (Learning, Change, decision making etc.), Process, Clients, Resources (People & Infrastructure), Systems, Practices, Geography, Marketing, Branding, Change, Technology, Pricing, Market Acceptance, Social Media, Business Communications, Finance, Investments, Risk, Vendor, Research, Transitions, Mergers & Acquisitions.

Aequitas Global was founded by the Team of professionals with experience in Start-up’s and Growth-Stage companies. Our expertise from inception to the growth stage and a combined “inside-the-ring” experience of going through every stage of development, including inorganic growth.

Aequitas Global guide SME’s about the Pricing strategy, market acceptance, funding requirements and also helps them to find the right investment partner. Apart from identification process we also help in identifying right pockets were they can park-in the fund to capitalize on the potential Market opportunity.

Our Services:

• Strategic Planning & deployment. • Emerging Market entry. • Operational & Outsourcing - BD, HR, OD & more. • Research, Innovation & Technology Strategy. • Merger & Acquisitions for SME. • Investment, Brand, Risk, Change & Audit solutions.
